top.geek_studio.chenlongcould.musicplayer.views

类 PlayPauseDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • top.geek_studio.chenlongcould.musicplayer.views.PlayPauseDrawable

  • public class PlayPauseDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    PLAY-PAUSE Drawable

    一个可从 PLAY 到 PAUSE 图标变化的 Drawable
